contentencoded: The next big tech company to release its earnings this week is Google. The search giant will report this afternoon. But a lot of the news about Google of late has been on privacy issues. Molly Wood of CNET tells Marketplace Tech host Ben Johson all about it.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

The next big tech company to release its earnings this week is Google. The search giant will report this afternoon. But a lot of the news about Google of late has been on privacy issues. Molly Wood of CNET tells Marketplace Tech host Ben Johson all about it.

"}]
description: With Google set to report its earnings, the company is taking some heat about privacy issues.
title: Google's privacy problems
teaser: With Google set to report its earnings, the company is taking some heat about privacy issues.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 17, 2013
